name: WooCommerce Responsive Product Category
author: Ponco

sections.description:
WooCommerce Responsive Product Category

This is a WordPress Plugin that work as a widget

the purpose is displaying WooCommerce Product Category Menu as a widget

this menu widget support responsive.

at desktop resolution, will display child categories when mouse hover

at mobile, child menu will display below its parent.

Requirements :

  • WooCommerce

  • BootStrap 3 (optional, for displaying arrow)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. Go to Appearance > Widget, Select and place Woo Product Category Responsive to preferred sidebar
sections.faq:
Plugin Not Working

Make sure you have install and activate WooCommerce plugin already

chevron arrow not displayed

Please include bootstrap 3

short_description: This plugin work as a widget displaying WooCommerce Product Category in vertical menu. Mobile Responsive supported.
